argument.name: Real_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of a real image in the string dictionary.

page.description: The .Remove() method removes a logical image name entry from the string dictionary.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% image_1=$a5_folder image_2=$a5_folder_open %str%) ? nm.exists("image_1") = .T. nm.remove("$a5_folder") ? nm.exists("image_1") = .F.
